Package index

All functions

extract_attribute() experimental
Extract and optionally format a specific attribute
format_all_attributes() experimental
Format all available reptile attributes
format_comments() experimental
Format reptile comment data Extracts and formats general comments associated with reptile species.
format_common_names() experimental
Format common names for reptiles
format_diagnosis() experimental
Format diagnostic information for reptiles
format_distribution() experimental
Format distribution data into a long table format
format_etymology() experimental
Format etymological data of reptiles Extracts and formats the etymological information associated with reptile species.
format_higher_taxa() experimental
Format higher-level taxonomic data for reptiles
format_references() experimental
Format bibliographic reference data of reptiles Extracts and formats bibliographic references associated with reptile species.
format_reproduction() experimental
Format reproductive data for reptiles
format_selected_attributes() experimental
Format selected reptile attributes
format_subspecies() experimental
Format subspecies data for reptiles
format_synonyms() experimental
Format synonym data for reptiles
format_types() experimental
Format nomenclatural type data for reptiles
get_reptiledb_data()
Access Reptile Database Taxonomic Information
list_subspecies_reptiledbr()
List Subspecies from ReptileDB
reptiledb_012025
Reptile Checklist with Subspecies Information
reptiledbr_exact()
Search Reptile Species by Exact Match and Subspecies Presence
reptiledbr_partial()
Fuzzy Search for Species Names Using Approximate Matching
search_reptiledbr()
Comprehensive Search for Reptile Species with Exact and Fuzzy Matching
